languages.text: "Капитан Саргона и его флагман "Бессердечный", скрывается в Ничейных мирах. Точное местоположение удастся определить только с помощью авгуров вашего флагмана, когда войдем в систему".
"Captain Sargona and his flagship, the Heartless, are concealed in Mundus Nullius. The exact location can only be determined with your ship's augurs when we enter the system."
languages.original_text: "Капитан Саргона и его флагман "Бессердечный", скрывается в Ничейных мирах. Точное местоположение удастся определить только с помощью авгуров вашего флагмана, когда войдем в систему".

traits.locale_text: "Captain Sargona and his flagship, the Heartless, are concealed in the Mundus Nullius. The exact location will only be determined with your ship's augurs when we enter the system."
"Captain Sargona and his flagship, the Heartless, are concealed in the Mundus Nullius. The exact location will only be determined with your ship's augurs when we enter the system."
"Captain Sargona and his flagship, the Heartless, are concealed in the Mundus Nullius. The exact location will only be determined with your ship's augurs when we enter the system."
"Captain Sargona and his flagship, the Heartless, are concealed in Mundus Nullius. The exact location can only be determined with your ship's augurs when we enter the system."
"Captain Sargona and his flagship, the Heartless, are concealed in Mundus Nullius. The exact location can only be determined with your ship's augurs when we enter the system."

languages.text: «El capitán Sargona y su nave insignia, la Desalmada, se ocultan en Mundus Nullius. Sus augures tendrán que revelar su ubicación exacta cuando entremos en el sistema».
languages.original_text: "Captain Sargona and his flagship, the Heartless, are concealed in Mundus Nullius. The exact location can only be determined with your ship's augurs when we enter the system."

traits.locale_text: «El capitán Sargona y su nave insignia, la Desalmada, se ocultan en Mundus Nullius. Sus augures tendrán que revelar su ubicación exacta cuando entremos en el sistema».

languages.text: “萨戈纳舰长和他的旗舰‘无心号’藏身于纽鲁斯领。至于他的确切位置，我们需要抵达星系之后使用俄歇矩阵扫描才能确定。”
languages.original_text: "Captain Sargona and his flagship, the Heartless, are concealed in Mundus Nullius. The exact location can only be determined with your ship's augurs when we enter the system."

traits.locale_text: “萨戈纳舰长和他的旗舰‘无心号’藏身于纽鲁斯领。至于他的确切位置，我们需要抵达星系之后使用俄歇矩阵扫描才能确定。”

languages.text: « Le capitaine Sargona et son vaisseau amiral, le Sans-Cœur, se cachent dans le secteur de Mundus Nullius. Quant à sa position exacte, il nous faudra attendre d'entrer dans le système pour que vos augures puissent la déterminer. »
languages.original_text: "Captain Sargona and his flagship, the Heartless, are concealed in Mundus Nullius. The exact location can only be determined with your ship's augurs when we enter the system."

traits.locale_text: « Le capitaine Sargona et son vaisseau amiral, le Sans-Cœur, se cachent dans le secteur de Mundus Nullius. Quant à sa position exacte, il nous faudra attendre d'entrer dans le système pour que vos augures puissent la déterminer. »

languages.text: 「キャプテン・サルゴナと彼の船のハートレスはムンドゥス・ヌリウスに隠されています。正確な位置は、私たちがシステムに侵入するときにあなたの船のオーガーでのみ特定されます」
languages.original_text: "Captain Sargona and his flagship, the Heartless, are concealed in Mundus Nullius. The exact location can only be determined with your ship's augurs when we enter the system."

traits.locale_text: 「キャプテン・サルゴナと彼の船のハートレスはムンドゥス・ヌリウスに隠されています。正確な位置は、私たちがシステムに侵入するときにあなたの船のオーガーでのみ特定されます」

languages.text: "Kaptan Sargona ve sancak gemisi Taşkalp, Mundus Nullius'ta gizleniyor. Tam yerlerini ancak sisteme girdiğimizde geminizin alametleri ile tespit edebileceğiz."
languages.original_text: "Captain Sargona and his flagship, the Heartless, are concealed in Mundus Nullius. The exact location can only be determined with your ship's augurs when we enter the system."

traits.locale_text: "Kaptan Sargona ve sancak gemisi Taşkalp, Mundus Nullius'ta gizleniyor. Tam yerlerini ancak sisteme girdiğimizde geminizin alametleri ile tespit edebileceğiz."

languages.text: "Captain Sargona versteckt sich mit seinem Flaggschiff, der Heartless, im Mundus-Nullius-System. Seine exakte Position können die Auguren Eures Schiffs erst vor Ort bestimmen."
languages.original_text: "Captain Sargona and his flagship, the Heartless, are concealed in Mundus Nullius. The exact location can only be determined with your ship's augurs when we enter the system."

traits.locale_text: "Captain Sargona versteckt sich mit seinem Flaggschiff, der Heartless, im Mundus-Nullius-System. Seine exakte Position können die Auguren Eures Schiffs erst vor Ort bestimmen."

languages.original_text: "Captain Sargona and his flagship, the Heartless, are concealed in the Mundus Nullius. The exact location can only be determined with your ship's augurs when we enter the system."
